text: ninnal ariyuka: ihaleakajivitamennal kaliyum vineadavum alankaravum ninnal parasparam durabhimanam natikkalum svattukalilum santanannalilum peruppam kanikkalum matraman‌- oru mala peale. atu mulamuntaya cetikal karsakare ascaryappetutti. pinnitatin unakkam badhikkunnu. appeal at mannaniram puntatayi ninakk kanam. pinnitatu turumpayippeakunnu. ennal paraleakatt (durvrttarkk‌) kathinamaya siksayum (sad‌vrttarkk‌) allahuvinkal ninnulla papameacanavum pritiyum unt‌. aihikajivitam vancanayute vibhavamallate marreannumalla
